Ogre::TerrainPageSourceListener

Ogre::TerrainPageSourceListener Class Reference

Abstract class which classes can override to receive notifications when a page is ready to be added to the terrain manager. More...

#include <OgreTerrainPageSource.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void pageConstructed (TerrainSceneManager *manager, size_t pagex, size_t pagez, Real *heightData)=0
 Listener method called when a new page is about to be constructed.

Detailed Description

Abstract class which classes can override to receive notifications when a page is ready to be added to the terrain manager.

Definition at line 40 of file OgreTerrainPageSource.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Ogre::TerrainPageSourceListener::pageConstructed (  TerrainSceneManager *  manager,
size_t  pagex,
size_t  pagez,
Real *  heightData
)  [pure virtual]
 

Listener method called when a new page is about to be constructed.

Parameters:
manager The manager in question
pagex,pagez The index of the page being constructed
heightData Array of normalised height data (0..1). The size of this buffer will conform to the scene manager page size. The listener may modify the data if it wishes.
